TEXT.TITLE: AVX <AVX> FILES TO OFFER CONVERTIBLE DEBENTURES
TEXT.BODY: AVX Corp said it filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission a registration statement covering a 75 mln dlr issue of convertible subordinated debentures. The company named Shearson Lehman Brothers Inc as manager of the offering. Reuter
